data.message:
You want to domesticate
Used hate to educate
But at the same time
You want to decimate
A whole country
That’s going hungry
The same country
That you let escalate
That you also underestimate
While your own country
Still investigates
So why should we
Be Russian into hate?
If lies is all you
Wanna resuscitate
But you still say
You’re here to make
Your country great
Build walls is all it takes
While your own countrymen
You seal and steal their fates
Shoot to kill
Those who shoot it straight
Fake news, retaliate!
\
